mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PASSWORD , MEMBER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE_NUMBER , WRITER , WRITE_DATE , MODIFIER , MODIFY_DATE , USER_STATUS) VALUES (#{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{memberPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NULL , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , 'Y')
